value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Nngh...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Rise and shine, Princess! It's time for
us to play a little game...$k$p$EFace|Oh, but here come some pesky little
rodents. I have a feeling they'll want
to spoil our fun.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|You! Tell me your name and your
affiliation—$k$p$EFace_Pain|Wait a minute! Who do you think you
are?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Two...Commander Annas?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|This must be so very shocking for
you, mustn't it? You have my
apologies, my dear.$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|$EFace_Smile|I suppose it's true that we've never
met in person...$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|I am Loki, loyal servant of His Royal
Highness, King Surtr. Pleased to
make your acquaintance.$k$p$EFace_Cool|I'm even more pleased to bid you
farewell... Though I must apologize, I
suppose. You'll be dying here.$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We've pushed through the enemy's
line, $Nu!$k$pOur job now is to capture their leader.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, wouldn't you just know it. I lost.
How strong you all are...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Especially you, Summoner. I've taken
a little bit of a fancy to you. Yes, you,
$Nu...$k$pHere's hoping we meet again, my
dear! Hee-hee!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Hold it right there! I'm not finished
with you yet. I want some answers!$k$p$EFace_Anger|Hmm, $Nu?
What is it?$k$p$Sbs500|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$EFace_Anger|Light's coming from Breidablik...$k$pAnd it's pointing the way over there...$k$p

$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Uhn...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Look! Someone's collapsed! It's a
woman...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It seems her lance is resonating with
the divine weapon.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse! She's still breathing! Do you
think she's a Hero from another
world?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I don't know...but I do know we can't
just leave her here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Agreed. Let's take her back to base.$k$p$Sbs150|
